requirementText.name: Other Content Category
requirementText.description: When the mets/@TYPE attribute has the value "OTHER" the mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE attribute MUST be used to declare the content category of the package/representation. See also: Content Category, https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#VocabularyContentCategory

rule.description: If mets/@TYPE = "OTHER" then mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE MUST exist.

error.message: mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE attribute does not exist. MUST be: If mets/@TYPE = "OTHER" then mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE MUST exist and have a value.

package.name: mets-xml_mets_TYPE_attribute_value_OTHER_and_csip-OTHERTYPE_attribute_not_exist
package.description: METS.xml file has mets/@TYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE attribute does not exist.

package.name: valid_minimal_mets_TYPE_value_OTHER
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, mets/@TYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE = "Textual works - Manuscripts".

rule.description: If mets/@TYPE = "OTHER" then mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE MUST exist and have a value.

error.message: mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE attribute has no value. MUST be: If mets/@TYPE = "OTHER" then mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE MUST exist and have a value.

package.name: valid_minimal_mets_TYPE_value_OTHER
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, mets/@TYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE = "Textual works - Manuscripts".

rule.description: If mets/@TYPE = "OTHER" then mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE MUST NOT have a value from the VocabularyContentCategory because these vocabulary values MUST be used for the attribute mets/@TYPE.

error.message: mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE attribute has a value that should instead be used for mets/@TYPE. MUST be: mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE MUST describe a content category that falls outside of the VocabularyContentCategory vocabulary.

package.name: mets-xml_mets_TYPE_attribute_value_OTHER_and_csip-OTHERTYPE_value_TYPE_vocabulary_1
package.description: METS.xml file has mets/@TYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE = "Textual works - Print".

package.name: valid_minimal_mets_TYPE_value_OTHER
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, mets/@TYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE = "Textual works - Manuscripts".

rule.description: If mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE exists then mets/@TYPE MUST be "OTHER".

error.message: mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE exists although mets/@TYPE is not "OTHER". MUST be: mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE MUST only exist if mets/@TYPE = "OTHER".

package.name: mets-xml_mets_TYPE_attribute_value_not_OTHER_and_csip-OTHERTYPE_exists
package.description: METS.xml file has mets/@TYPE equal to a value from VocabularyContentCategory, but not "OTHER" (e.g. "Textual works - Print"), and mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE exists (e.g. is "Textual works - Manuscripts").

package.name: valid_minimal_mets_TYPE_value_OTHER
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, mets/@TYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERTYPE = "Textual works - Manuscripts".
